com.tinkerpop.gremlin.structure.strategy

Interface Strategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Strategy.Local, Strategy.Simple

    public interface Strategy
    A traverser of a GraphStrategy object owned by a Graph instance.
    Author:
    Stephen Mallette (http://stephen.genoprime.com)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Strategy.Context<T extends StrategyWrapped>
      The Strategy.Context object is provided to the methods of GraphStrategy so that the strategy functions it constructs have some knowledge of the environment.
      static class  Strategy.Local
      A Strategy implementation where the GraphStrategy can be get or set as ThreadLocal.
      static class  Strategy.Simple
      Basic Strategy implementation where the GraphStrategy can be get or set.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default <T> T compose(Function<GraphStrategy,UnaryOperator<T>> f, T impl)
      If a Strategy is present, then return a GraphStrategy function that takes the function of the Gremlin Structure implementation denoted by T as an argument and returns back a function with T.
      Optional<GraphStrategy> getGraphStrategy()
      Gets the GraphStrategy for the Graph.
      void setGraphStrategy(GraphStrategy strategy)
      Set the GraphStrategy to utilized in the various Gremlin Structure methods that it supports.

    • Method Detail

      • setGraphStrategy

        void setGraphStrategy(GraphStrategy strategy)
        Set the GraphStrategy to utilized in the various Gremlin Structure methods that it supports.

      • getGraphStrategy

        Optional<GraphStrategy> getGraphStrategy()
        Gets the GraphStrategy for the Graph.

      • compose

        default <T> T compose(Function<GraphStrategy,UnaryOperator<T>> f,
                      T impl)
        If a Strategy is present, then return a GraphStrategy function that takes the function of the Gremlin Structure implementation denoted by T as an argument and returns back a function with T. If no Strategy is present then it simply returns the impl as the default.
        Parameters:
        f - a function to execute if a GraphStrategy is present.
        impl - the base implementation of an operation that does something in a Gremlin Structure implementation.
        Returns:
        a function that will be applied in the Gremlin Structure implementation
